item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am a PhD candidate in Biotechnology at the University of Verona. Officially. But I prefer to consider myself as a newbie in everything. This means that I am very curious and I love to learn and discover new things. Apart from the romanticisms, I like life sciences and as a PhD candidate in Biotechnology (plant genetics) my project aims at the identification of the genes involved in the regulation of flowering and veraison in grapevine.

item.title: First post
item.description: This is my new website which I intend to use it as a lab notebook where I share my research projects, ideas and R coding examples
